extendedInfo.description: Get quick information and forthcoming dates of all religious festivals.Major festivals for following religions.* Asatru* Buddhism* Bahai* Christian* Hindu* Islamic* Jewish* Jain* Sikh* Wiccan* ZoroastrianFeatures:* Significance and legends of each festival.* Forthcoming dates.

reviews.title: 2013 Updates?
reviews.comment: Please update for 2013-14 ... I teach World Religions, and have used this app in my class before. I would like to continue doing so! Thanks!
reviews.author: Christine Boardwine

reviews.title: Outdated app
reviews.comment: I had purchased this application but now this is running with old data still showing holidays of 2012.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good app.
reviews.comment: Seems like a very handy app, Lots of info on different festivals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: After reading the reviews, I thought it would be a nice app to have. Its ok. But it didnt even have Ramadan listed under Islam.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I purchased this application, but you still in 2011. When are you going to change to 2013?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I Enjoy it when it works but it crashes as often as it works if not more so. Very buggy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If u want 2 see more info, just scroll, it doesn\'t cut off. True it is just basic info, but some of it is more than I knew b4, so no complaints ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s pretty awesome. Would be cool if you could have it automatically send holidays to the calendar for you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only shows up to like fifteen lines of description and if the text is longer it just cuts off. Information could be more detailed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its a great app but, it would be amazing if they added a little more info on the wiccan dates :+)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app! Thank you for updating it for 2011!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, would be great to choose which sect\'s holidays I want to move to my calendar...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Five if thay fix link to calendar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good variety of religions represented. Could also Include the Chinese too Ally
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The app only has the dates for 2010. Need app that has the future dates 2011 on. If it had the future dates for importing then it would be worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s great! Descriptions are good. I\'d say It\'s worth it. General info, but nice to always have it on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Gives info on festivals that I can read in a book.What about celestial phases?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Lots of info on different festivals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this app, It doesn\'t sync with cal then force closes on Sprint hero, fix sync issue and will give 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app. But every time I try to intergrate to my google it says that its unsupported format.
